params.name: releaseChannel
params.label: Release Channel
params.description: Find more information on the release channels here: https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/release-channels

params.name: clusterVersion
params.label: Kubernetes version
params.description: Defaults to the latest of the configured release channel. Find more information on the available versions here: https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/release-notes

params.name: isRegional
params.label: Regional
params.description: Whether the cluster is regional (if not, it's zonal)

params.name: locations
params.label: Locations
params.description: Zones in which nodepools are created (if empty, all zones of the region)

params.name: s-network
params.label: Networking
params.description: • For VPC-native clusters, leave IP ranges empty to let GKE automatically assign them.

params.name: inheritFromDSSHost
params.label: Inherit DSS host settings
params.description: Create cluster in same VPC/subnetwork as DSS host

params.name: isVpcNative
params.label: Make cluster VPC-native
params.description: Allocate pod/service IPs directly from GCP network (RECOMMENDED)

params.name: podIpRange
params.label: Pod IP range
params.description: [Optional] Range name or CIDR block/mask notation, e.g. 10.1.0.0/16 or /16. MUST not overlap with the subnet IP range. If using a named range, ensure it is at least as large as /21.

params.name: svcIpRange
params.label: Service IP range
params.description: [Optional] Range name or CIDR block/mask notation, e.g. 10.2.0.0/20 or /20. MUST not overlap with the subnet IP range nor the pod IP range.

params.name: nodePools
params.label: Node pools
params.description: Node pools to create in the cluster

params.name: isAutopilot
params.label: Autopilot
params.description: Create a cluster with node pools managed by GKE

params.name: clusterLabels
params.label: Labels
params.description: Annotate all the cluster's related GCP resources

params.name: httpLoadBalancing
params.label: HTTP load balancing
params.description: Enable interaction with Google Cloud's load balancing abilities

params.name: creationSettingsValve
params.label: Custom creation settings
params.description: Additional settings for the cluster creation call, as JSON
